GK19aghatkvu:2: apūrvaḥ ko 'yaṃ te varada śirasaḥ śekharavidhir nanu jñātaṃ pluṣṭaṃ smaradhanur idaṃ mūrdhani dhṛtam /
GK19aghatkvu:3: yadālokāl loke viṣamaviśikhaḥ sphūrjatitarām iti prokte devyā galitaniyamaḥ śambur avatāt //
GK19aghatkvu:4: idaṃ proṣitapramadayā hetubhūtayā proṣitapramadām uddiśya kathyate kulakam |
GK19aghatkvu:11: proṣitaḥ pramado vallabho harṣaś ca yasyāḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:12: athaca proṣitā vallabhena viyuktā, prakṛṣṭena yauvanaśṛṅgārajanitena madena ca yuktā |
GK19aghatkvu:14: chādite dinakarasya bhāvane khāj jale patati śokabhāvane /
GK19aghatkvu:15: manmathe ca hṛdi hantum udyate proṣitapramadayedam udyate // Ghk_1 //
GK19aghatkvu:16_0: dinaṃ karotīti dinakaras tasya bhāvane raśmipuñje chādite tiraskṛte sati tāsāṃ tamaḥpratipakṣatayā
GK19aghatkvu:16_1: suprasiddhānām api sa sūryo yatra ācchādyate tatra kathaṃ harṣāloko 'pi mānaso 'stu,
GK19aghatkvu:17: athaca virahiṇīnāṃ rajanisamayajanitaraṇaraṇakakaluṣitahṛdayāṇāṃ kadācit dinam api vividhavinodālokavitaraṇena bandhutāṃ yāyāt |
GK19aghatkvu:18: adya tu yatprasādāt tādṛśadinam upajāyate tasya api kaścid ātmīyaḥ sahajaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:19: so 'pi ācchadita iti sātiśayaṃ bhāgyahīnatvaṃ dyotitam |
GK19aghatkvu:23: jalaṃ hi nikaṭavartinā pārthivarajasā ātmānaṃ bhāvayati ekatayā yojayatīti śrutam idam,
GK19aghatkvu:24: adya tu apūrvaṃ vartate śokena virahiṇīr bhāvayati śokamayya eva sampādyante tāḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:25: na hi tāsāṃ prāvṛṭsamayamadhye priyāgamanaśaṅkāmātram api astīti tātkālaṃ nairāśyam eva khāt patatīty anena amuṣya duṣprasahasya apratīkāratayā sātiśayo 'nutāpaḥ sūcyate |
GK19aghatkvu:27: athaca bāhyo yaḥ kaścit hantā tasmād upāyaiḥ palāyyate 'pi,
GK19aghatkvu:28: ayaṃ punar hṛdayāvasthita eva antarhananaṃ prati sasaṃrambhaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:30: yathā kaścit durjano nirjane nirāloke durdina eva saśokaṃ janam ata eva nirudhyamānam ekākinaṃ prāpyaiva labdhacchidraḥ praharati,
GK19aghatkvu:31: tathāiva amuṣmin kāla īdṛśam iva kāminījanaṃ madanas tāḍayatīty arthaḥ || GhkV_1 ||
GK19aghatkvu:32: sarvakālam ativāhya toyadā āgatāḥ stha dayito gato yadā /
GK19aghatkvu:33: nirdayena paradeśasevinā māriṣyatha hi tena māṃ vinā // Ghk_2 //
GK19aghatkvu:35: he toyadāḥ ! macchokabhāvakajalavitaraṇodyatā yatra vayaṃ priyaviyuktā na abhūma,
GK19aghatkvu:36: tādṛśaṃ kālam ativāhya yatra kvacit yāpayitvā yadā adya dayito gatas tadā yūyam āgatāḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:37: tathā sarvaṃ kālaṃ diṣṭam athaca kṛtāntarūpaṃ yeṣāṃ te tathā matibāhyā amanojñamanasaḥpīḍakatvāt te ca toyadāś ceti vigrahaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:38: ataś ca māṃ māriṣyatha, kākvā uktiḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:40: yena dayitajanavirahitā bhīṣaṇabhavadīyacaritāvalokanaparikhinnahṛdayā jīvitatyāgena api sukham āsīnā |
GK19aghatkvu:41: athaca dayitena vinā yā jīvati sā avaśyavadhārhaiva |
GK19aghatkvu:42: yaś ca dirdayaḥ san paradeśaṃ sevate,
GK19aghatkvu:45: na hi asau jaladharasamaye kim api kāryaṃ kartum samartha iti avaśyam eka eva kvacana ciram āste iti |
GK19aghatkvu:46: tasmād asmāsu upari prema tāvad āstām; dayām api yadi akariṣyat,
GK19aghatkvu:47: tad avaśyam ihaiva āgamiṣyad ity etāvatī kaṣṭaparampareti anena viśvāsaparipāṭījanitadauḥsthityasūcakena dhvanyate || GhkV_2 ||
GK19aghatkvu:48: priyatamaṃ prati nijāvasthāṃ jijñāpayiṣur bhīṣaṇajaladavijṛmbhām asahiṣṇur yuktyā kathaṃcid vacanāt yadi amī deśāntaraṃ vrajeyus tat sarvaṃ sampatsyate |
GK19aghatkvu:49: priyatamo 'pi ca taddeśaprāptajaladharadhvānākarṇanena kadācit madīyām avasthāṃ svayaṃ vā anubhaved api ity abhiprāyeṇa nāyikā idam āha
GK19aghatkvu:50: brūta taṃ pathikapāṃsulaṃ ghanā yūyam eva pathiśīghralaṅgan /
GK19aghatkvu:51: anyadeśaratir adya mucyatāṃ sāthavā tava vadhūḥ kim ucyatām // Ghk_3 //
GK19aghatkvu:55: tam pathikānām madhye pāṃsulaṃ nirmaryādaṃ nirdayaṃ brūta |
GK19aghatkvu:56: etad eva tasya abhijñānaṃ yat pathikeṣu madhye sa eva nirdaya ity arthaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:57: yato yūyam eva pathaḥ śīghraṃ laṅgayathety anena katham itaḥ kṣipram eva vrajeyur iti protsāhanā dhvanyate |
GK19aghatkvu:58: brūteti ca adhyeṣaṇā iyam, laṅganaṃ ca ciravrajitasya api jhagiti āsādanam |
GK19aghatkvu:60: sa katham yo mārgaṃ laṅghayitum na śakyas tena adya itaś calitena labhyeteti bhāvaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:62: anyasmin deśe yā iyaṃ ratir vinā api kāryam āsaktiḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:63: athaca vallabhāntareṇa saha premavisrambho na hi anyathā ambudharakālo 'tivāhya iti,
GK19aghatkvu:65: avaśyaṃ hi tayā ratyā bhavān grathita eveti upālambhagarbhā uktiḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:68: atha kathaṃ prema savisrambhaṃ śithilayituṃ śaktas tarhi sā tava vadhūr na punaḥ priyatamā,
GK19aghatkvu:70: kiṃ kathyatām, na vayam apriyam āvedayāmaḥ, niścitaṃ tu prāṇān naiva dhārayet |
GK19aghatkvu:71: athavā sāthavā tava vadhūr ity etāvat sandeśavacanam abhidhāya kim ahaṃ kathaṃ vā bhaveyam iti kim alīkavikatthaneneti avaśyam eva na jīvāmīty arthaḥ || GhkV_3 ||
GK19aghatkvu:72: haṃsapaṅktir api nātha samprati prasthitā viyati mānasaṃ prati /
GK19aghatkvu:73: cātakaś ca tṛṣito 'mbu yācate duḥkhitā pathika sā priyā ca te // Ghk_4 //
GK19aghatkvu:74: yadi punar adya mārge gamanam āgamanaṃ ca na yujyate iti śaṅkyate,
GK19aghatkvu:75: tad evaṃ brūteti nāyikā āha -- he pathika ! na hi bhavān nityaṃ yathā gacchati,
GK19aghatkvu:76: ato yadā taddeśagato 'bhūt tadā sā priyā śrūyate sma |
GK19aghatkvu:77: ataḥ cātakas tṛṣākrānto jalaṃ yācate, sā ca tava yāñcāṃ karoti |
GK19aghatkvu:79: tvaṃ tu tadīyayāñcāṃ prati na kārakaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:80: sa hi yāñcāṃ prati kārako bhavati yaḥ kadācit āśāpūraṇaṃ karoti |
GK19aghatkvu:83: ata eva āha na prabhuḥ paryanuyogārhaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:84: haṃsānāṃ sambandhinī paṅktir atibahavo 'pi haṃsā adya ākāśamārge mānasaṃ prati pracalitāḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:85: eko 'pi hi yatra gacchati, tatra avaśyam aparasya api aniruddhena pathā bhāvyaṃ |
GK19aghatkvu:87: yataś ca jaladharamuktajalapaṭale te viyato bhuvi sañcaranti tasya yad ekāyatanam ākāśaṃ tad eva haṃsānāṃ mārgatvena vartate |
GK19aghatkvu:89: yatra ca atidūraṃ mānasaṃ gantuṃ nirbuddhīnām api haṃsānām udyamaḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:90: tatra parimitadeśanivṛttimātra eva na kim iti sā priyā bhavato yācate || GhkV_4 ||
GK19aghatkvu:91: nīlaśaṣpam abhibhāti komalaṃ vāri vindati ca cātako 'malam /
GK19aghatkvu:92: ambudaiḥ śikhigaṇo vinādyate kā ratiḥ priya mayā vinādya te // Ghk_5 //
GK19aghatkvu:94: cātako nirmalaṃ jalaṃ vindati jalaṃ labhate,
GK19aghatkvu:95: mayūrakulaṃ ca meghaiḥ kekāyuktaṃ kriyate ity etair vākyair pratyuta iha āgacchatas tava kim api pathi manoharatvam iti dhvanyate |
GK19aghatkvu:97: adya tu tūṣṇīṃ sthitasya mayā vinā kā ratiḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:98: na kācid iti svātmasaubhāgyasaṃbhāvanāgarbhā iyam uktiḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:99: athaca mama īdṛśī avasthā yato vartate,
GK19aghatkvu:100: tato māṃ prati śaṣpaṃ nīlaṃ malinasvabhāvam api komalaṃ karuṇārdram iva bhāti |
GK19aghatkvu:101: cātakaś ca yo nāmnaiva priyagaganajalaḥ prasiddhaḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:104: ambudaiś ca virahihṛdayasphoṭanapaṭutaragarjitair api mamopari karuṇāvaśāt nijasuhṛtkulam ākrandavat sampādyate |
GK19aghatkvu:105: kā punar mayā vinā mama abhāve kā aratiḥ kaḥ khedaḥ, na kaścit |
GK19aghatkvu:106: tathā mama abhāve bhavataḥ kā iyaṃ ratiḥ ko 'yam anubandhaḥ, sā mriyatām iti |
GK19aghatkvu:107: athaca prāṅ mayā vinā tava ratir na kadācid abhūt, adya tu kathaṃ sā ratiḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:108: adyety anena prāg atyantapremarasamānasatām kapaṭena kila prakaṭitavān asīti dhvanyate |
GK19aghatkvu:109: ata eva sotprāsaṃ priyeti āmantraṇam iti upālambhagarbhā bhaṇitiḥ || GhkV_5 ||
GK19aghatkvu:111: toyadāgamakṛśā ca sādya te durdhareṇa madanena sādyate // Ghk_6 //
GK19aghatkvu:112: amī ye bhavatā puraḥ paridṛśyante kalāpinas te meghānāṃ secanapradhānānāṃ sambandhinā śabdena muditāḥ kekāpriyatvāt,
GK19aghatkvu:113: tathā ca proṣitānāṃ kāntānāṃ sambandhini hṛdaye śokaṃ lāpayanti samyak śleṣayanti avaśyaṃ,
GK19aghatkvu:114: tathā proṣitānāṃ hṛdaye śokaṃ lapanti teṣu hi kūjatsu avaśyaṃ virahiṇyaḥ śokavatya iti niścīyate,
GK19aghatkvu:116: sā ca te priyā adya ca tava durdhareṇa kāmena pūrvaṃ hi kāmabhayabhītāyās tvam eva śaraṇam abhūḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:117: adya tu iha sthitasya tava madano durdhara iti durnivāraḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:118: sambandhamātre ṣaṣṭhī, na tu kartari “khalartha” (2.3.69) iti pratiṣedhāt |
GK19aghatkvu:119: tathā tavaiva sannihitasya sā toyadāgame kṛśā abhūt |
GK19aghatkvu:120: āgamiṣyati jaladharasamayaḥ pravatsyati ca priyatamaḥ iti raṇaraṇakavatī bhavatsannidhāne kṛśā babhūva |
GK19aghatkvu:121: adya tatra madhye bhūyān kālo gata iti asyā adya hitena bhavitavyam iti kavinibaddhadūtīvacanam idam |
GK19aghatkvu:122: na hi meghānāṃ svayam eva “meghaśabdamuditāḥ” iti “toyadāgama-” iti ca svātantryeṇa kathayitum ucitam |
GK19aghatkvu:123: “ambudaiḥ śikhigaṇo vinādyate” ity atre tu prāktanaśloke meghamukhasañcāritākṣarā nāyikā eva kavinā vaktṛtvena upanibaddhā,
GK19aghatkvu:125: kiṃ kṣamāpi tava nāsti kāntayā pāṇḍugaṇḍapatitālakāntayā /
GK19aghatkvu:126: śokasāgarajale ca pātitāṃ tvadguṇasmaraṇam eva pāti tām // Ghk_7 //
GK19aghatkvu:127: sakhyā eva dūtītvena preṣitāyā iyaṃ bhaṇitiḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:131: tat kiṃ tayā hetubhūtayā kṣamā api nāsti |
GK19aghatkvu:132: pānḍuracchāyayoḥ kapolayoḥ patitā alakāntā yasyāḥ tadīyakapolatalapāṇḍimānaṃ malinasvabhāvā alakā api prekṣituṃ na pārayantīty arthaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:134: tvaṃ yadi tasyā vallabhas tayā īdṛśyā janamātrakṛpābhājanabhūtayā api yā sāmānyajanasya kṛpā bhavati,
GK19aghatkvu:135: sāpi na asti tava ātmani iyatāpi puruṣaguṇaṃ bahumānaṃ vahato 'pi |
GK19aghatkvu:136: tathāpi sā śokārṇavapānīye meghasamayavāriṇā pātitā bhavadīyaguṇasmaraṇena eva rakṣyate |
GK19aghatkvu:137: athaca tvattas tava sakāśāt patitā śoke,
GK19aghatkvu:141: vastutas tu tvadguṇānām eva sātiśayasambhogādīnāṃ smaraṇena eva śoke patitā |
GK19aghatkvu:143: yad uta tena niṣkaruṇena pātitā api tvadguṇasmaraṇena eva rakṣyate |
GK19aghatkvu:144_0: mama kila sa priyatamo 'pagato nirbahumāno māṃ prati ca dṛḍhatarapremapavitritāntaḥkaraṇo
GK19aghatkvu:144_1: nūnaṃ mām eva tadavasthāṃ yathā pūrvaṃ trātavaṃs tathā trāsyate iti tvadguṇānāṃ smarantī sā jīvatīti yāvat |
GK19aghatkvu:146: so 'pi avaśyaṃ guṇasmaraṇavṛttyā eva rakṣyate dṛḍhaguṇaviracitarajjvavalambanena jātucid uttareyam apīty arthaḥ || GhkV_7 ||
GK19aghatkvu:148: dravati ca kaluṣaṃ jalaṃ nadīnāṃ kim iti ca māṃ samavekṣase na dīnām // Ghk_8 //
GK19aghatkvu:149: iyaṃ vilāpāvasthāṃ yātāyāḥ svayam eva nāyikāyā uktiḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:150_0: puṣpitāni kuṭajāni yeṣu vaneṣu yāḥ samutsukā utkaṇṭhitā mādṛśyas tāsāṃ yāni ānanāni
GK19aghatkvu:150_1: priyatamaviyuktāni teṣu tadviṣaye nadīnām api kaluṣaṃ jalaṃ galati asmādṛśīnāṃ virahiṇīnām
GK19aghatkvu:150_2: ānanāni avalokya jaḍabhāvānām api kaluṣaṃ jalaṃ galati,
GK19aghatkvu:151: asmādṛśīnāṃ virahiṇīsaritāṃ śokāvilaṃ jalaṃ galatīty arthaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:152: tvaṃ māṃ dīnāṃ kim iti samavekṣase 'pi na |
GK19aghatkvu:156: mārgeṣu meghasalilena vināśiteṣu kāmo dhanuḥ spṛśati tena vinā śiteṣu /
GK19aghatkvu:157: gambhīramegharasitavyathitā kadāhaṃ jahyāṃ sakhi priyaviyogajaśokadāhaṃ // Ghk_9 //
GK19aghatkvu:158: visṛṣṭāyām api dūtyāṃ tadvacanākarṇanād api na āgata iti śokākulamanasi nāyikāyāṃ yadā,
GK19aghatkvu:159: kadācit sakhī tatsamāśvāsanāya ittham abhihitavatī -- mārgāṇāṃ duḥsañcaratvād asau na prāptaḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:160: tadā punar api nāyikāyāḥ sakhiṃ prati iyam uktiḥ -- sakhi ! paśya ,
GK19aghatkvu:161: mārgā meghasalilena nāśitās tathāparo 'yaṃ doṣaḥ -- apratyayeṣu mārgeṣu śitā iṣavo yatra tādṛk dhanuḥ spṛśati,
GK19aghatkvu:162: śitaṃ śiraṃ sandhāya ākarṇākṛṣṭaṃ moktum icchatīty arthaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:166: tathāvidheṣu api teṣu duḥsahaṃ smaraśarabhayaṃ smaraś ca tadvarjaṃ śarān sandhatte mām eva tāḍayati,
GK19aghatkvu:167: anyathā kadācit tasyaiva gamanam iha sambhāvyate |
GK19aghatkvu:168: atha ihasthā eva jaladasamayam ativāhayāmi, tat gambhīreṇa ghangarjitena jātatrāsā tiṣṭhāmi |
GK19aghatkvu:169: ato he sakhi ! kadā ahaṃ priyaviyogajam śokadāhaṃ jahyām |
GK19aghatkvu:170: ahaṃ ca meghaśabdavyathitā, madanaś ca niśitaśarapātanodyata iti avaśyaṃ mama jīvitāntena bhāvyaṃ |
GK19aghatkvu:171: tac ca kadā bhavet, yatra ahaṃ sakalaśokanirmuktā sampadyeyeti |
GK19aghatkvu:172_0: kecit sakhīpriyeti paṭhantaḥ sahṛdayāḥ katham adya api sakhī dūtītvena visṛṣṭā sā
GK19aghatkvu:172_1: api na āgatā tat nūnaṃ tatsambhogarasalālasayā tayā bhāvyam iti sambhāvayantyāṃ nāyikāyāṃ
GK19aghatkvu:172_2: kayācit vayasyayā mārgadaurātmye tadāgamanavighnakāriṇi upanyaste svayaṃ nāyikāyā
GK19aghatkvu:173: mārgas tāvat naṣṭāḥ tena ca vinā madanaḥ praharatīti tannikaṭāt calituṃ na yujyate 'syāḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:175: priyeṇa ca saha viyogaḥ, tathā tasyāḥ sakhyāḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:176: idānīṃ yaḥ priyas tena saha viyogaḥ, tajjaṃ śokadāhaṃ kadā jīvitāntena api jahyām || GhkV_9 ||
GK19aghatkvu:178: madanasya kṛte niketanānāṃ pratibhānty adya vanāni ketanānām // Ghk_10 //
GK19aghatkvu:184: tathā garjatāṃ meghānāṃ pavanena vījitānāṃ prabodhitānām |
GK19aghatkvu:185: ata eva kāmasya kṛte niketanānāṃ saṅketadhāmnām |
GK19aghatkvu:187: jaladhararasitatadvimuktaśīkarāsārasahitaś ca pavanas teṣām eva prabodhanahetutayā sukumāratām āpta iti kim atra jaladasamaye mārgavaiṣamyam,
GK19aghatkvu:188: tat nūnam eva ketanavānāvalokanaprabodhitamadanasthānasukhasaṃskāraḥ priyatama āgamiṣyatīti sambhāvayantyā nāyikāyā bhaṇitiḥ pratibhātīti |
GK19aghatkvu:189: apare tu vanaśabdapaunaruktyam amṛṣyamāṇā madanasya avane rakṣaṇe kṛte ajitānāṃ ketanānāṃ vanāni śobhante iti āhuḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:190_0: athavā saurabheṇa ye vane ekānte yatra aparaḥ paritrātā na sambhāvyate tatra jitā
GK19aghatkvu:190_1: apahṛtadhairyavṛttayaḥ kṛtā vimohitāḥ kecana virahijanāḥ teṣāṃ daivavaśāt jaladharaśiśirapavanaprabodhitānām
GK19aghatkvu:190_2: api punar api etāni ketanavanāni kāmasya kṛte karaṇāya pratibhānti |
GK19aghatkvu:191: madanātaṅkakaraṇād ṛte na eteṣāṃ kim api prayojanam iti yāvat |
GK19aghatkvu:193: yadā svananto garjanto 'mbhodharā yatra saṃjātakṛpāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:194: tatra amīṣāṃ ketanavanānāṃ kā iyaṃ niṣkaruṇatā || GhkV_10 ||
GK19aghatkvu:195: tat sādhu yat tvāṃ sutaruṃ sasarja prajāpatiḥ kāmanivāsa sarja /
GK19aghatkvu:196: tvaṃ mañjarībhiḥ pravaro vanānāṃ netrotsavaś cāsi sayauvanānām // Ghk_11 //
GK19aghatkvu:198: he sarjanāmadheya ! prajāpatir yat tvām sasarja śobhanaṃ taruṃ,
GK19aghatkvu:201: kākur iyaṃ evaṃ dhvanati -- prajānāṃ kila patyā avaśyaṃ prajāhitakāriṇā bhavitavyam,
GK19aghatkvu:202: evaṃvidhahṛdayadāhavitaraṇaniḥśeṣitanikhilajantoḥ kāmasya nivāsabhūtaṃ bhavantaṃ nirmimāṇena prajāpatinā suṣṭhu prajāpatitvam uddarśitaṃ,
GK19aghatkvu:203: tvayi dṛṣṭamātra eva mama kāpi vyathā vijṛmbhate ity arthaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:204: atha evaṃ api jānatī kim iti mām avalokitavaty asīti yadi,
GK19aghatkvu:205: tat kila mañjarībhir bhavān sakalavanamadhye śreṣṭho bahvībhiḥ kantābhis tu parivṛta iti śṛṅgāriṇi bhavati bahumāna ity arthaḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:207: yadā kila ahaṃ yuvatiḥ priyasaṃyuktā tvām avalokitavatī,
GK19aghatkvu:209: adya tvam evaṃvidhabahutaravallabhāparivṛto bhūtvā kathaṃ māṃ priyaviyuktāṃ trātavyāṃ darśanamātreṇa api madanaparavaśāṃ karoṣīti vākyārthaḥ || GhkV_11 ||
GK19aghatkvu:210: navakadamba śiro 'vanatāsmi te vasati vo madanaḥ kusumasmite /
GK19aghatkvu:211: kuṭaja kiṃ kusumair avahasyate praṇipatāmi ca duṣprahasya te // Ghk_12 //
GK19aghatkvu:212: yadā sarjataror apakrāntā nāyikā jhagiti kadambam avalokayati,
GK19aghatkvu:213: tadā prāktanamadanabhayabhītimatī jhagiti āha -- he navakadamba ! idānīm eva avalokitānubhūtatvadīyapratāpā ahaṃ tubhyaṃ śirasā avanatā asmi |
GK19aghatkvu:215: tāvat tadīyakusumavilokanajanitaraṇaraṇakā āha -- yuṣmākaṃ puṣpavikāse kāmo vasati,
GK19aghatkvu:216: mayā jñātaṃ sarjasyaiva idaṃ vaiṣamyaṃ yāvatā tvam api evam eva,
GK19aghatkvu:217: sarveṣām ekayogakṣamateti sarvathā mama hātāśāyā nayanaviṣayatākṣamaṃ na kiñcit samastīti va iti bahuvacanena dhvanyate |
GK19aghatkvu:218: itthamākārayatnī eva nāyikā yadā kusumitaṃ jhagiti kuṭajam avalokayati,
GK19aghatkvu:219: tadā manyate nūnaṃ mām ayaṃ sarvato hi hatabhāgadheyām apahasatīti tata āha -- he kuṭaja ! kim iti avāṅmukhaṃ kṛtvā hasyate |
GK19aghatkvu:221: yaś ca sannihita eva param apahasati,
GK19aghatkvu:224: te duḥsahasya praṇāma eva śobhana iti kākuḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:226: kiṃkusumair iti kutsitaiḥ parātaṅkavitaraṇacaturaiḥ puṣpair avahasyate iti sotprāsaṃ kākvā dhvanito 'rthaḥ || GhkV_12 ||
GK19aghatkvu:227: taruvara vinatāsmi te sadāhaṃ hṛdayaṃ me prakaroṣi kiṃ sadāham /
GK19aghatkvu:228: tava puṣpanirīkṣitāpadehaṃ visṛjeyaṃ sahasaiva nīpa deham // Ghk_13 //
GK19aghatkvu:229: he nīpābhidhāna taruśrṣṭha ! tava sarvakālam ahaṃ praṇatā,
GK19aghatkvu:230: tat kim adya mama hṛdayaṃ dāhayuktaṃ prakarṣeṇa karoṣi |
GK19aghatkvu:231: anye 'pi taravo na evaṃ māṃ dahanti yathā tvaṃ sarvakālam abhiṣṭuto 'pi,
GK19aghatkvu:233: athaca tava sadā ahaṃ praṇatā yena īdṛśaḥ upakāras tvat sambhāvyate,
GK19aghatkvu:238: tāni tu yadi mahāpuruṣatayā evaṃvidhām avasthāṃ prāptāṃ mām avalokeyuḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:241: na ca evaṃ sambhāvanīyam -- ahito hṛdayadāhakāri kathaṃ praṇamyate iti yataḥ kiṃ tvaṃ hṛdayaṃ sadāhaṃ karoṣi,
GK19aghatkvu:243: nijena eva virahahutavahena mama dahyate hṛdayaṃ,
GK19aghatkvu:244: tad idānīṃ dāhakena api dagdhasya kiṃ dahyate iti sambandhaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:245: yadi tu ahaṃśabdapaunaruktyaṃ sahṛdayāḥ kṣamante tadā evaṃ vyākhyā -- āpade viṣamavipadvahanārtham eva kevalaṃ yo mama dehas taṃ tyajeyam iti |
GK19aghatkvu:246: tathā nīpa taruvara tava natā asmi |
GK19aghatkvu:247: evam uktvā duḥsahatayā dvitīyavākyam āha -- dāhayuktaṃ mama hṛdayaṃ prakaroṣi,
GK19aghatkvu:250: tathā sarvakālaṃ tvatpuṣpekṣitā aham akāṇḍa eva dehaṃ tyajeyaṃ,
GK19aghatkvu:253: madhunaḥ samavekṣya kālatāṃ bhramaraś cumbati yūthikālatām // Ghk_14 //
GK19aghatkvu:255: madīyapriyatamas tu pathika ekatra eva kvacit sthito mama nāma api na avekṣate iti |
GK19aghatkvu:258: tato 'nantaraṃ tu ghanair muktās tyaktā ye 'mbulavās taiḥ karaṇabhūtaiḥ prahāsitaiḥ kusumair upalakṣitām |
GK19aghatkvu:259: athaca ghanā muktāphalasadṛśā ye jalakaṇāḥ tatkṛtāni yāni prahāsitāni prahāsitatvotpāditāni nijacchāyāsphuraṇāni yaiḥ pītāni api santi śuklāni jātāni kusumāni |
GK19aghatkvu:260: kiṃ kṛtvā madhuno makarandasya kālatām atyantaparipākarasotpannāṃ vilokya |
GK19aghatkvu:261: athaca yo nāyakaś cirāt kāntām upabhuṅkte,
GK19aghatkvu:262: so 'pi madhunaḥ pānagoṣṭhyāḥ kālatām avasaraprāptim avalokya paricumbati |
GK19aghatkvu:264_0: tathā sā api kāntā dhammillapuṣpair ghanair muktāphalair virahasmaraṇānandādikotpannaiś
GK19aghatkvu:264_1: ca ambulavair bāṣpair harṣacāṭvādijaiḥ prahasitaiḥ sitair baddhair vyāmiśrarūpatayā
GK19aghatkvu:264_2: sthitaiḥ parasparasaṃśliṣṭair upalakṣitā bhavati kilakiñcitaceṣṭālaṅkārayoginī bhavati
GK19aghatkvu:267: ityādi | ata īdṛśī kadā ahaṃ priyeṇa paricumbyamānā bhuyāsam ity arthaḥ || GhkV_14 ||
GK19aghatkvu:269: salilair vihataṃ rajaḥ kṣitau ravicandrāv api nopalakṣitau // Ghk_15 //
GK19aghatkvu:271: mā tvam adhṛtiṃ kārṣīḥ, mārgavaiṣamyād eva asāv iyantaṃ kālaṃ na āgataḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:272: tathāhi nīradair meghair upetya sarvatodikkaṃ saṅghaṭya khaṃ gaganaṃ nicitam |
GK19aghatkvu:273: kīdṛśaiḥ priyaiḥ priyābhiś ca ye vihīnā viyuktās teṣāṃ hṛdayāvanīṃ manobhūmīṃ radanti vilikhanti |
GK19aghatkvu:274: evaṃ tāvat sarvatodikkaṃ duṣprekṣaṃ kṣitau bhūmau rajaḥ salilair vihatam |
GK19aghatkvu:275: āstāṃ tāvad anyat salilena abhibhūyate rajomātram api na avaśiṣṭam ity arthaḥ || GhkV_15 ||
GK19aghatkvu:276: haṃsā nadanmeghabhayād dravanti niśāmukhāny adya na candravanti /
GK19aghatkvu:277: navāmbumattāḥ śikhino nadanti meghāgame kundasamānadanti // Ghk_16 //
GK19aghatkvu:278: he kundakusumasadṛśadaśane ! parivarjitatāmbūlādisambhoge ! pratidūtyāś caiva nāyikāṃ prati uktiḥ -- evaṃ nāma meghāḥ śabdāyante yat haṃsā api palāyante,
GK19aghatkvu:279: rātrāv api na sañcaraṇaṃ yujyate yataś candrayuktāni tanmukhāni na bhavanti,
GK19aghatkvu:280: ete ca śikhino mayūrā udgatapraharṣavaśāt śabdāyante |
GK19aghatkvu:281: etena tat pratyuktaṃ yat tu nāyikayā pūrvam uktaṃ
GK19aghatkvu:284: tad eva hi pratyuta raṇaraṇakapradīpakaṃ mārgasaṅkaṭatāṃ karotīty arthaḥ || GhkV_16 ||
GK19aghatkvu:285: meghāvṛttaṃ niśi na bhāti nabho vitāraṃ nidrābhyupaiti ca hariṃ śubhasevitāram /
GK19aghatkvu:286: sendrayudhaś ca jalado 'dya rasann ibhānāṃ saṃrambham āvahati bhūdharasannibhānām // Ghk_17 //
GK19aghatkvu:288: yato rātrisamaye vitāraṇ vigatatārāpaṭalaṃ nabho na bhāti yato meghāvṛttam |
GK19aghatkvu:289: yac ca tayā uktaṃ “pathikapāmsulo 'sau mām upekṣate” iti,
GK19aghatkvu:291: śubhasevitāram akaluṣacaritam api bhagavantaṃ hariṃ nidrā abhyupaiti aśaknuvatī virahaṃ soḍhum nāyakam abhisarati pratyutety arthaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:292: indrāyudhayuktajalado rasan śabdāyamāna ibhānāṃ kariṇāṃ parvatasadṛśānāṃ saṃrambhaṃ saṃrabdhatām āvahati samantāt darśayati |
GK19aghatkvu:294: so 'pi anyānullaṅghanīyena śakrāyudhena vajreṇa sātiśayabhīṣaṇaḥ sādinā hatānāṃ kariṇāṃ sādṛśyam udvahatīty arthaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:295: athavā meghaḥ śabdāyamāna ibhānāṃ kariṇāṃ parvatasadṛśānāṃ saṃrambhaṃ janayati pratigarjanaśaṅkayeti te 'pi kṣubhitāḥ sampannā iti sarvathā susaṅkaṭāḥ panthānaḥ || GhkV_17 ||
GK19aghatkvu:297: paridhīraravaṃ jalaṃ darīṣu prapaty adbhutarūpasundarīṣu // Ghk_18 //
GK19aghatkvu:298: pratidūtyā eva iyam uktir nāyikā yadā evam āha nanu aham eva tatra yāsyāmīti, tadā tāṃ prati |
GK19aghatkvu:299: darīṣu guhāsu api antaḥsthitā yā adbhutarūpasundaryās tāsu api upari jalaṃ patatīti vyadhikaraṇasaptamyau |
GK19aghatkvu:307: aparasya ye trāsadāyinas te 'pi yato jaladhararasitāt trasyanti,
GK19aghatkvu:308: tatra kā vārtā bhavādṛśīnāṃ mālatīkusumasukumāramanasām iti tātparyārthaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:310: darīṣu antaḥ paritaḥ samantāt dhīro gambhīro ravo yasya,
GK19aghatkvu:311: kandarāsu antaḥ pratiśabdena dviguṇībhūta ity arthaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:312: tena eṣā api āśā na asti -- toyadajalapaṭalaṃ gaganāt nipatat kvacana guhāmukhe 'tivāhya punar api gamiṣyāma iti || GhkV_18 ||
GK19aghatkvu:313: kṣipraṃ prasādayati samprati ko 'pi tāni kāntāmukhāni rativigrahakopitāni /
GK19aghatkvu:314: utkaṇṭhayanti pathikāṇ jaladāḥ svanantaḥ śoko vivardhati ca tadvinatāsv anantaḥ // Ghk_19 //
GK19aghatkvu:315_0: evam etābhir uktibhiḥ priyatamāgamanaṃ durghaṭam iti avagate āsthābandho nāyikāyā
GK19aghatkvu:315_1: vijāghaṭītīty abhiprayeṇa sā eva punar āśvāsasampādanāya asya mādhyasthye viśeṣānuddeśāt
GK19aghatkvu:315_3: samprati jaladasamaye tāni kāntāmukhāni niratiśayasaundaryavanti rativigraheṇa praṇayakupitena
GK19aghatkvu:315_4: sañjātaroṣāṇi tathā yāni tadīyaviyogajanitapāṇḍimnā adya āsādhāraṇadharmasundarāṇi
GK19aghatkvu:315_5: kṣipram anāyāsena eva prasādayati tvām avaśyaṃ prasādayatīti yāvat |
GK19aghatkvu:316: nanu na adyāpi asāv āgatas tat katham etat |
GK19aghatkvu:317: āha śabdāyamānā hi jaladharāḥ pathikān raṇaraṇakavataḥ kurvanti niścitaṃ dinād dinam upacīyamānajaladharadhvānākarṇanena parivardhitotkaṇṭhaḥ priyatamas tāvad āgacchatīti yāvat |
GK19aghatkvu:319: āha tadvanitāsu pathikadayitāsu tathā śoko vivardhati vivṛddhavad ācarati yathā anantaḥ sampadyate |
GK19aghatkvu:320: cakāreṇa evaṃ dhvanyate tad eva rasitaṃ tāsāṃ śokavivṛddhau kāraṇam iti || GhkV_19 ||
GK19aghatkvu:322: tāsām ṛtuḥ saphala eva hi yā dineṣu sendrāyudhāmbudharagarjitadurdineṣu /
GK19aghatkvu:323: ratyutsavaṃ priyatamaiḥ saha mānayanti meghāgamaṃ priyasakhi śvasamānayanti // Ghk_20 //
GK19aghatkvu:324: ayaṃ śloko 'tratya iva na lakṣyate, pustakeṣu kena kāraṇena gata iti na vidmaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:325: tathāhi pūrvaślokaucityaṃ tāvad arthena na bhajate |
GK19aghatkvu:326: tāsām eva saphala ṛtur varṣākhyo yāti yā sendrāyudhair ambudair durdineṣu priyatamaiḥ saha ratyutsavaṃ mānayanti |
GK19aghatkvu:327: anyathā kila he priyasakhi ! meghāgamaṃ śvasamāḥ sārameyaprāyā api nayanti -- iti vyākhyāyāṃ prāktane nave (?)
GK19aghatkvu:330: yān astaṃ gacchann ino mārtaṇḍo yeṣu dineṣu -- ity api vyākhyāne tāsām iti apekṣito yadartho durupapādaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:331: tāsām iti tu anapekṣitayadarthe padavyaṅgye dhvanau vyākhyāyamāne uttaravākyaṃ khaṇḍaṃ gacchet caramārdhe cānyatheti (?)
GK19aghatkvu:332: madhye śāstranyāyopacitaḥ kāvyāmṛtakāluṣaikakāraṇam adhyāhāraḥ kalpyaḥ śvasamā meghāgamaṃ nayantīti param anaucityam |
GK19aghatkvu:333: na ca evaṃvidhena anaucityena kulakaparisamāptiḥ kriyamāṇā sahṛdayacetaḥsu romanthād ṛte kiñcit vidadhyāt |
GK19aghatkvu:334: śvasatīti śvasas tadvad ācaratīti kvip tato 'pi tācchīlyādivivakṣāyāṃ cānaś |
GK19aghatkvu:335: tataḥ priyasakhiśabdena sambandhaḥ prāg eva vā |
GK19aghatkvu:336: tathāpi na kiñcid arthasya pauṣkalyam, kaṣṭakalpanāyasaṃ sat |
GK19aghatkvu:338: priyasakhiṣv iti saptamyā samāsa iti bahuvacanānte 'pi na kaścit kṛtaḥ sambandhaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:340: kiñca atra kartā mahākaviḥ kālidāsa iti anuśrutam asmābhiḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:341: na ca asya kāvye tṛṇamātram api kalaṅkapātram utprekṣitavanto manorathe'; pi supte 'pi sahṛdayāḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:343: sa ca sakhyā pratidūtībhūtayā nāyikāyā āsthābandhadārḍhyotpādanāya yujyate |
GK19aghatkvu:344: utpannasamāśvāsā hi hṛdayaṃ sthāpayantī vipralambhayituṃ śakyā syāt
GK19aghatkvu:348: tena asya parisamāptidhurodvahasya api durandharatvam avikalam eveti |
GK19aghatkvu:349: tad idaṃ yuktam ayuktaṃ veti svayam eva vidāṃ kuruta sahṛdayāḥ || GhkV_20 ||
GK19aghatkvu:350: bhāvānuraktalalanāsurataiḥ śapeyam ālabhya cāmbu tṛṣitaḥ karakośapeyam /
GK19aghatkvu:351: jīyeya yena kavinā yamakaiḥ pareṇa tasmai vaheyam udakaṃ ghaṭakarpareṇa // Ghk_21 //
GK19aghatkvu:352: kavinā auddhatyaprakaṭanāya sahṛdayajanamānasarañjanāya pratijñā iyam upanibadhyate |
GK19aghatkvu:353_0: sañjātapipāsaḥ karakośena hastasampuṭena peyaṃ pānārhaṃ tāvad avasaraprāptam api
GK19aghatkvu:353_1: jalam atyantābhilāṣautsukyapātram adrohayogyam api pratyuta ālabhya drugdhvā sahajapremapraṇayinīsambhogarasaiś ca śapeyam |
GK19aghatkvu:354: atra śarīrasparśanākhyasya upālambhasya na atīva spaṣṭateti “śapa upalāmbhane” (Vā-911)
GK19aghatkvu:356: yena pareṇa kavinā yamakair jīyeya, tasmai ghaṭakarpareṇa jalaṃ vaheyam |
GK19aghatkvu:358: atra ca yamakānāṃ vipralambhaśṛṅgārarasātiśayavighnabhūtānām api mayā tathā apṛthagyatnanirvartyatayā nibandhaḥ kṛtaḥ,
GK19aghatkvu:359: yena pratyuta rasaparipoṣakaviśiṣṭavyākhyābhidhāyipadaparamparālābho yamakaiḥ sampannaḥ | tad uktaṃ
GK19aghatkvu:362: iti | etayā ca pratijñayā etat parihṛtaṃ
GK19aghatkvu:366: na hi iyaṃ rājājñā, api tu rasabandhavighnakāritvapramādaḥ parihāryaḥ |
GK19aghatkvu:367: atra ca pratyuta ātmaparipoṣakatvam eva uktena prakāreṇa yamakānām iti |
GK19aghatkvu:369: sā eva lokottarā vyutpattir iti abhidhīyate; na tu anyā kaviśakter vyutpattir nāma kācit |
GK19aghatkvu:370: yad uktaṃ mayā eva raurave vicāre
GK19aghatkvu:371: “na vai doṣā doṣā na ca khalu guṇā eva ca guṇā
GK19aghatkvu:373: iyaṃ sā vaidagdhī prakṛtimadhurā tasya sukaver
